### Hankey :hankey:


*A friendly library for adding color to your logs :smiley:*

```js
const { info, log } = require("./index");

info(":wave: hey there!")
error(":bomb: Oh noes!")
action(":dizzy: doing something big!")

const yo = "oy";
log("a shorter console.log", { yo });
```

![ex]

> [example.js](./example.js).
